Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , the impact of p53 inhibition on acute vs . late - stage DOX cardiotoxicity was examined in a juvenile model .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| DOX cardiotoxicity |
| acute DOX cardiotoxicity |
| late-stage DOX cardiotoxicity |

Explanation:
The paragraph is discussing the impact of p53 inhibition on two forms of DOX (doxorubicin) cardiotoxicity: acute and late-stage. Therefore, the diseases mentioned in the paragraph are DOX cardiotoxicity, acute DOX cardiotoxicity, and late-stage DOX cardiotoxicity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| DOX cardiotoxicity |
| acute DOX cardiotoxicity |
| late-stage DOX cardiotoxicity |

Explanation:
The paragraph only mentions "DOX cardiotoxicity," "acute DOX cardiotoxicity," and "late-stage DOX cardiotoxicity," which are all diseases or conditions. Other words in the paragraph, such as "impact," "p53 inhibition," "examined," "juvenile model," do not refer to diseases and can be disregarded.
